body: "With a measly 199 followers, @Judecelestin10's campaign  seems to have underestimated Twitter as a communications tool": kiskeacity looks at the popularity of Haitian political candidates on Twitter.
original_body: "With a measly 199 followers, @Judecelestin10's campaign seems to have underestimated Twitter as a communications tool": kiskeacity looks at the popularity of Haitian political candidates on Twitter.
title: Haiti: Candidates on Twitter
